easynavigator.command.converted: Detected a change in dimensions. Now navigating to
easynavigator.immersivemode.cannotstart: Immersive mode requires you to have a compass to navigate
easynavigator.immersivemode.pausenavigat: Navigation paused until a compass is reacquired
yacl3.config.minecraft:easynavigator.con: When enabled, will automatically convert the destination coordinates for you when you change dimensions.
yacl3.config.minecraft:easynavigator.sca: Changes how large the compass is displayed.
yacl3.config.minecraft:easynavigator.dis: Changes where the compass is positioned.
yacl3.config.minecraft:easynavigator.pad: Allows you to move the compass further to the center of the screen, increasing the distance to the edges.
yacl3.config.minecraft:easynavigator.arr: Changes how close you have to be to your destination for the system to detect that you have arrived.
yacl3.config.minecraft:easynavigator.nav: Toggle if messages will be sent on usage of the /navigate command
yacl3.config.minecraft:easynavigator.hig: Shows any found coordinates in a message at it's end..
yacl3.config.minecraft:easynavigator.cha: Changes the color of found coordinates in chat.
yacl3.config.minecraft:easynavigator.mat: How far can numbers be apart to still be considered the same coordinate.
yacl3.config.minecraft:easynavigator.imm: Requires you to have a Compass in your inventory to start navigating.
yacl3.config.minecraft:easynavigator.com: Decide what happens when you drop your compass while navigating.
yacl3.config.minecraft:easynavigator.ale: When enabled, will send a message when you are navigating and dropped your compass.
